entities.name: bane
entities.description: Bane is a person who walked over to stand next to Ronan and looked skywards. He mentioned that Mars is bright tonight.

entities.name: ronan
entities.description: Ronan is a person who was standing with Bane and looking at the sky.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is grumpy and has heard that Mars is bright tonight. He wants to know if anyone sees anything unusual.

entities.name: mars
entities.description: Mars is mentioned as being bright tonight by Bane.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who asks Hagrid if there are many centaurs in the area and if they are good at turning up when needed.

entities.name: centaur
entities.description: Centaurs are mentioned as being deep and knowing things but not letting on much. They are also described as star-gazers who are not interested in anything closer than the moon.

relationships.description: Hagrid has a good relationship with centaurs, as he mentions that they are good enough about turning up when needed.
Hermione asks Hagrid questions about the centaurs in the area.
